summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Yesler Way, in the City of Seattle, from the alley between 3rd Avenue and 4th Avenue, to the west margin of Broadway, by planking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1303 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
